Description: A rich curry made with yogurt-marinated chicken, cooked in a buttery tomato sauce.
Paneer cubes in a thick paste made from pureed spinach, seasoned with garlic and garam masala.
A spicy stir-fry dish with chicken, peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers.
Soft tofu set in a spicy sauce, typically a thin, oily, and bright red suspension, with minced meat.
Spicy chickpea curry flavored with a tangy blend of tomatoes, onions, and spices.
Braised lamb chunks cooked with a gravy based on browned onions, yogurt, garlic, ginger and aromatic spices.
A renowned duck dish from Beijing, known for its crispy skin and succulent meat.
Seasoned barbecued pork, characterized by its shiny, sweet glaze.
Mixed rice dish with aromatic spices and marinated chicken, mutton, or vegetables.
Cooked rice stir-fried with eggs, vegetables, seafood or meat, and seasoned with soy sauce.
